_meta.description: Default domain profile for shortcuts that don't match a specialized domain. Provides common patterns and best practices.

prompt_context: You are generating an Apple Shortcut. Follow these best practices: use descriptive variable names that reflect their content, provide user feedback with showresult or alert when a shortcut completes, handle edge cases (empty input, missing data) with IF checks. Keep shortcuts focused on a single task. Use COMMENT actions to document complex logic sections.

common_patterns.input_handling: Use askforinput or shortcutinput for user data. Validate with IF before processing.
common_patterns.output_delivery: Use showresult for simple output, setclipboard for copy-to-clipboard, share for flexible sharing.
common_patterns.error_feedback: Use alert for errors (modal, requires acknowledgment). Use notification for non-critical warnings.

example_patterns: Ask for input, process it, show result to user
Get clipboard, transform content, copy back to clipboard
Present menu of options, execute chosen action, confirm completion
